metadata.title: USN-6470-1 -- Axis vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Axis incorrectly handled certain inputs. If a user or an automated system were tricked into opening a specially crafted input file, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2023-40743)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6470-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libaxis-java-doc - 1.4-24ubuntu0.1~esm1 libaxis-java - 1.4-24ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
